EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Chris,
Next week is good. Please use my online scheduler and pick a time that works for you.
Have a good new year.
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Chris Dues [mailto:chris@salescrunch.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 28, 2011 2:10 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Steve,
I apologize for the late response. I am out of the office this week and will be returning next Monday. Let's setup a quick chat so can get a better understanding of your sales process. How does next week look for you?
Thanks, Chris Dues Customer Success Specialist SalesCrunch Phone: 571-319-1855 My meeting room: http://www.crunchconnect.com/chris-dues
CrunchConnect - Sales Delivery and Intelligence Platform Smart & social meetings without soul sucking software!
On Tue, Dec 27, 2011 at 9:01 AM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Chris,
I received your contact information from Gene Zaino, who you met at the Gigaom conference. Would like to set-up some time to learn more about your organization and product.
Are you available tomorrow after 3pm EST?
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
